title: Stratis Blockchain Plugin
description: Stratis Plugin gives you ability to build new worlds using NFT and power of decentralised Stratis Platform
longDescription:
Stratis Plugin is a plugin that helps you to interact with node within Stratis blockchain. It gives you ability to use power of decentralized infrastructure to build next-generation apps and games, using cutting-edge technologies such as NFT and dApps.


Non-Fungible Tokens “NFTs” are of special relevance to game developers that want to include in-game currency. By implementing an NFT, in-game things can be truly held by the player, eliminating the possibility of losing acquired things due to lost login credentials or account termination.


dApps stands for "decentralized applications". dApps have their backend code (smart contracts) running on a decentralized network and not a centralized server. They use the Stratis blockchain for data storage and smart contracts for their app logic.

A smart contract is like a set of rules that live on-chain for all to see and run exactly according to those rules. This allows code to mediate agreements and transactions.


This plugin uses TrustWallet Core library.

https://github.com/trustwallet/wallet-core


If you want to learn more about Stratis Platform, check our documentation portal: https://academy.stratisplatform.com/index.html


Join us on Github: https://github.com/stratisproject/UnrealEnginePlugin

Join our Discord channel: https://discord.com/invite/9tDyfZs
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Interacting with Stratis Node, building & sending blockchain transactions
  •  Deploying, minting and transferring NFTs and ERC20-like tokens
  •  Deploying custom-built contracts

Code Modules: (Please include a full list of each Plugin module and their module type (Runtime, Editor etc.))

  • Blockchain - runtime 
  • Stratis - runtime
  • StratisAPI - runtime
  • Wallet - runtime

Number of Blueprints: 15

Number of C++ Classes: 250

Network Replicated: No

Supported Development Platforms: Windows

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows

Documentation: https://academy.stratisplatform.com/Developer%20Resources/Unreal%20Engine/unreal-engine-introduction.html

Example Project: https://github.com/stratisproject/UnrealDemoGameProject

Important/Additional Notes: If you found a problem, you can open an issue on the project’s Github page. If you still have questions, feel free to ask them in our Discord channel.
